channel.title: CWE-215 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-215 on ZAP

item.title: Spring Actuator Information Leak
item.description: Spring Actuator for Health is enabled and may reveal sensitive information about this application. Spring Actuators can be used for real monitoring purposes, but should be used with caution as to not expose too much information about the application or the infrastructure running it.
